Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:vV14ColaE.name: pattern
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:vV14ColaE.abstract: Regular expression pattern that will be used to evaluate a specific string.

Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:FV14ColaE.name: init()
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:FV14ColaE.abstract: fatalError occurs when using this empty initializer as ColaExpression must be initialized using init(_ pattern:) or init(pattern:).

Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:FV14ColaE.name: matchedRanges(of:options:)
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:FV14ColaE.abstract: Evaluates a string for all instances of a regular expression pattern and returns a list of matched ranges for that string.

Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:FV14ColaE.name: matches(of:options:)
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:FV14ColaE.abstract: Evaluates a string for all instances of a regular expression pattern and returns a list of matched strings for that string.

Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:FV14ColaE.name: firstMatch(of:options:)
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:FV14ColaE.abstract: Evaluates a string for all instances of a regular expression pattern and returns the first of value of the list of matched strings for that string.

Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:FV14ColaE.name: isMatch(with:options:)
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:FV14ColaE.abstract: Tests a string to see if it matches the regular expression pattern.

Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:FV14ColaE.name: replaceOccurences(in:with:)
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:FV14ColaE.abstract: Replace specific ranges in a string with a specific character.

Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:ZFV14Cola.name: firstCharacterOfEachWord(in:)
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:ZFV14Cola.abstract: Returns an array containing the first letter of each word in the test string.

Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:ZFV14Cola.name: lastCharacterOfEachWord(in:)
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:ZFV14Cola.abstract: Returns an array containing the last letter of each word in the test string.

Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:ZFV14Cola.name: check(email:)
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:ZFV14Cola.abstract: Tests a string to check if it is a valid email address by using a regular expression.

Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:ZFV14Cola.name: sanitze(string:)
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:ZFV14Cola.abstract: Sanitizes of a string by removing all non-Alphanumeric characters (excluding whitespaces)

Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:ZvV14Cola.name: firstCharacterPattern
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:ZvV14Cola.abstract: Pattern matches first alphanumeric character of each word.

Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:ZvV14Cola.name: lastCharacterPattern
Structs/ColaExpression.html#/s:ZvV14Cola.abstract: Pattern matches last alphanumeric character of each word.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: isMatch(pattern:options:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: A Boolean value indicating if this string matches the given pattern.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: isAlpha()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: A Boolean value indicating if all the characters are letters.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: isAlphanumeric()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: A Boolean value indicating if all the characters are alphanumeric.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: isCapitalized()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: A Boolean value indicating if the first characters in all of the words in the string are uppercased.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: isDecapitalized()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: A Boolean value indicating if the first characters in all of the words in the string are lowercased.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: isLowercased()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: A Boolean value indicating if all the characters are lowercased.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: isNumeric()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: A Boolean value indicating if all the characters are numbers.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: isUppercased()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: A Boolean value indicating if all the characters are uppercased.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: contains(characters:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: A Boolean value indicating if all the characters in the string belong to a specific CharacterSet.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: matches(pattern:options:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Evaluates this string for all instances of a regular expression pattern and returns a list of matched strings for that string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: firstMatch(pattern:options:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Evaluates a string for all instances of a regular expression pattern and returns the first of value of the list of matched strings for that string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: matchedRanges(with:options:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Evaluates this string for all instances of a regular expression pattern and returns a list of matched ranges for that string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: camelCased()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns a camel cased version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: capitalized()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns a capitalized version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: decapitalized()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns a decapitalized version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: kebabCased()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the kebab cased (a.k.a. slug) version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: pascalCased()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns a pascal cased version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: snakeCased()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the snake cased version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: splitWordsByCase()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Splits a string into mutliple words, delimited by uppercase letters.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: swapCased()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the swap cased version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: firstCharacter()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the first character of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: lastCharacter()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the last character of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: latinized()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the latinized version of the string without diacritics.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: length()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the character count of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: reversed()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Retuns the reversed version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: withoutAccents()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the string without diacritics.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: replaceOccurences(matches:with:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Replace specific ranges in this string with a specific character using a given regular expression pattern.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: padding(length:token:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the center-padded version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: paddingLeft(length:token:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the left-padded version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: paddingRight(length:token:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the right-padded version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: paddingConditionsSatisfied(tokenCount:length:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: A Boolean value indicating if all the pre-padding operation conditions are satisfied.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: trimLeft(byKeeping:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns a prefixed version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: trimRight(byKeeping:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns a suffixed version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: trimLeft(byRemoving:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the left-trimmed version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: trimRight(byRemoving:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the right-trimmed version of the string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.name: truncated(length:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE14ColaExpres.abstract: Returns the truncated string with an ellipsis.
